info.name: DAFO
info.description: Test the APIs of the Datafordeler project.

exec: pm.test("Test validity of SAML token", function () {

request.description: Acquire a login token from the STS server, and save it in the current environment.

exec: pm.test("Test validity of SAML token", function () {
// Load library from global variable as mentioned here:
// Library is generated by browserifying a nodejs library + snippet,
// and modifying the browserified output. The library exposes the saml_decode function.
// Decode the response body, such that we get the resulting XML.

request.description: Acquire a login token from the STS server, and save it in the current environment.
Reject bad password.

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("No valid credentials given for passive STS");

request.description: Reject missing password.

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("No valid credentials given for passive STS");

request.description: Reject no password.
Reject bad username.

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("No valid credentials given for passive STS");

request.description: Reject missing username.

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("No valid credentials given for passive STS");

request.description: Reject no username.

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("No valid credentials given for passive STS");

request.description: Reject no login information.
